alert.note: Alert for Haleakala Summit (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 18 at 3:38PM HST until December 20 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING FOR ALL HAWAIIAN ISLANDS THROUGH MONDAY AFTERNOON... ...HIGH WIND WARNING FOR THE BIG ISLAND SUMMITS THROUGH 6 AM HST WEDNESDAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING FOR HALEAKALA SUMMIT THROUGH 6 AM HST TUESDAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 40 to 60 mph with higher gusts. Winds will increase to 70 to 80 mph with higher gusts by Monday morning and will continue through the day followed by gradual weakening on Monday night. * WHERE...Haleakala Summit. * WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can make driving and walking dangerous. The winds can forcefully open doors and damage hinges or slam doors shut, possibly causing injuries.
info.instruction: Be prepared for road-closures. Postpone travel to the summits until conditions improve.
